name: Suspicious Extexport Execution
description: Extexport.exe loads dll and is execute from other folder the original path
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*Extexport.exe* OR process.executable:*\\Extexport.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:extexport.exe)`
